title: Seasonal Bike Share Program, Elevator building, Beautiful courtyards
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Don’t Miss Your Opportunity to Lease a Huge 3bed, 3bath Apartment
description:
Don’t miss your opportunity to lease a huge three-bedroom, three-bath apartment in Bella Vista with PARKING, nestled among the stylish townhomes at Fonte Leon Place Residences, renamed and built on the site of the Old Fonte Leon Pool. Entering into the foyer space, you will move up to the second level you will find the sun-soaked living/dining area and kitchen with high ceilings and large windows throughout. This home’s modern kitchen features stone counters, stainless steel appliances, and custom cabinetry ideal for any home chef. Rounding out the first floor is one bedroom, with the potential for an office or gym, and a full bath. Making your way upstairs, there are two more bedrooms each with its own Juliet balconies and spa-style bathrooms as well as ample closet space. This home also features in-unit W/D and reserved off-street, garage parking. There are many landmark bakeries and eateries in the neighborhood and you will be within walking distance of local favorites such as Fiorella, Alma del Mar, Di Bruno Bros, Sarcone’s Bakery, and many more. title: Fantastic Condo on the Grounds of a Pristine Art Museum!
description:
Welcome to this amazing condo on a pristine Art Museum/Spring Garden block. This great home is located in the Greenport Condominium, an oasis on beautiful and historic Green St. It has an expansive and elegant common courtyard, a rooftop deck with great Center City views, and a deeded PARKING spot. This bi-level, 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath unit features not only a private entrance but also a private patio. Enter into the living/dining room areas with a beautiful stacked stone wood-burning fireplace. The newly renovated kitchen features granite countertops as well as stainless steel appliances. There is a pantry for extra storage as well as a laundry area. The primary bedroom has a tremendous amount of closet space and offers sliding wall-to-wall closets as well as a walk-in closet with built-in shelving. There is ensuite access to a newly renovated bathroom. A second bedroom with a second full bathroom on its own separate lower level. Great location, a few blocks from public transportation including the Broad Street line, within walking distance to Center City, museums, restaurants, and shops. Make your appointment today!!!

title: Cute and clean apartment in Manuta!
description:
Hello all,
I just found out I'll have to move overseas for my job and I'm looking for someone to take over my lease starting from the first of March or April (whatever works) until the lease ends at the end of July. You CAN sign a year-long contract that starts in either March or April as well!

title: A Tremendous Opportunity to Live at the Cusp of Two Top Neighborhoods
description:
Rittenhouse Square and Graduate Hospital. 1702 Lombard Street offers 4 finished levels of living space and is move-in ready. Step up from the sidewalk and enter into an open front living room featuring hardwood floors, a brick fire place, recessed lighting, and crown moulding. The open first level continues into the kitchen, which showcases granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a subway tile backsplash. Just beyond the kitchen are Pella sliding doors that lead out to an oversized red brick patio, the perfect retreat for the city dweller! Back inside, follow the stairwell up to the second floor. This level contains two bedrooms, closet space, and a white tiled bathroom. Steps above, the third floor houses the primary suite which includes a vaulted ceiling, two closets, a wonderfully updated primary bath with marble flooring and pedestal sink, and a bonus linen closet. Before heading on your way, step down to the lower level, which is fully finished and provides a convenient flex space. An additional room off of the main basement area can fashion as a bedroom, if desired. A laundry room with washer and dryer, as well as additional closet space complete the lower level. The perks of living at this address are countless! Locals enjoy the Schuylkill Banks park and dog park, top restaurants in Rittenhouse Square, charming cafes in Graduate Hospital, a handful of grocers, and quick access to I-76 and I-676. This location also offers convenient access to the University of Pennsylvania, CHOP, and HUP. Schedule your visit today!
1702 Lombard St

title: RECENTLY RENOVATED 2 BED, 1 BATH CORNER UNIT, WITH 2-CAR PARKING!
description:
Tucked away in Philly's vibrant Queen Village neighborhood, 830 S Howard St #2 is a recently renovated 2 bed, 1 bath corner unit, with 2-car parking, sat on the top level of a duplex. An idyllic courtyard, with gardens and picnic seating, welcomes you at the front of the building. Inside the unit, soaring cathedral ceilings and new luxury flooring frame the bright and airy living room. This space is filled with natural light from 3 windows and a skylight, while a 4th window brightens the separate dining area. The kitchen is fitted with new stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and plenty of cabinet & counter space. There's also room for extra storage or a small table. Down the hall, you'll find a sleek full bathroom adorned with modern fixtures, a glass-enclosed shower, and an updated vanity. Completing the unit are two spacious bedrooms. The primary bedroom has a wet-bar and a pair of sliding doors leading to a Trex deck spanning the unit's width. The building's shared laundry area is on the ground floor, along with an entry from this unit's one garage parking spot and one driveway spot. 830 S Howard's fantastic Queen Village location earns a Walk Score of 93! Nearby South St features markets, restaurants, and cafes, including Whole Foods, ACME, Good Karma, and Bridget Foy's. South of Washington Ave, neighborhood favorites Herman's Coffee, Charlie's Roast Pork, and Pennsport Beer Boutique line E Moyamensing Ave. Shot Tower playground & rec center and Jefferson Sq Park are a few blocks away, plus Target, Acme, Wine & Spirits, Ikea, and Lowes are close by. There's also easy access to public transit, Old City, I-95, and South Jersey via I-76. Schedule your in-person or virtual tour today!

A fully fenced in backyard with brand new concrete patio which is perfect for outdoor relaxation and grilling!
Lastly, there is an large semi-finished open basement area perfect for storage and play area. Don't miss out on this Great opportunity!!

title: Charming 1BR available Feb 1!
description:
Cozy up in this first floor one bedroom just off Baltimore Ave. Available February 1st – November 30th, 2023 with option to renew!
Enjoy a sunny, eat-in kitchen, and large built-in bedroom closet. The fenced outdoor patio is shared with one neighbor— perfect for flower boxes or grilling in the warmer months. The retro wallpaper in the living room is removable, but we hope you might love it as much as we have :) The bedroom gets the same light as the house, I just took this picture on a foggy Winter day!
Located just steps away from the laundromat, and around the corner from Fu-Wah, Hayashi Sushi, and the bars and cafes on Baltimore Ave. One block from the 34 trolley, short walk to the 13 & to Clark Park.
Heat & hot water included. Tenant pays electricity (~$30) and gas (~$20).
This apartment is on the ground floor, but above street level. There are 4 steps leading to the front door. Unfortunately the unit is not dog friendly, but cats are welcome :)
First, last, and security to move in totaling $3030
Thanks for looking!

title: 1927 Brandywine St.
description: LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION! Feast your eyes on a gorgeous, fully renovated 1867 Queen Anne Italianate carriage house situated on a quiet, well-maintained block in the heart of Fairmount! This home provides city living at its finest, includes a one car garage with extra storage and two private decks. Enter through a classic foyer with 2 stunning mahogany doors. The open floor plan boasts a well-appointed gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, a walk-in pantry, and a large breakfast bar area. Completing the first floor of this home are the dining room, a spacious family room, a powder room, a laundry area, and the garage with original blue slate flooring. The second floor includes a spacious living area with gorgeous hardwood flooring and a wood-burning fireplace for those cozy fall and winter evenings and two well-appointed en-suite bedrooms, including one bathroom with radiant heated floors and waterfall shower head. The third floor features a sun-filled study with an oversized cupola, beautiful in-laid hardwood floors and French doors, which lead to a large deck area, complete with a pergola, gas connected grill and views of the Art Museum fireworks. The beautiful primary suite includes a spacious walk-in closet, an elegant full bath with heated limestone floors, double vanity, and waterfall shower head and French doors that lead to another private roof deck where you can take in the breathtaking city views! Additional highlights of this home include updated mechanicals - new HVAC and a new water heater, custom millwork, a new roof, and high-end finishes throughout while simultaneously maintaining the original charm and unique character of the home. Located on a desirable, tree-lined street in the heart of the Art Museum area, just steps to Fairmount Park and so many great restaurants and The Barnes. There are also so many indoor and outdoor entertainment options close by like Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Boathouse Row, Schuylkill River Trail and so much more. Does this sound like your new home? Schedule your showing today - This charmer will not last long!

title: Spacious serenity inside this lux 2 bed 1 bath Brewerytown home!
description:
2832 W Stiles St > Available February 6th, 2023
Newly renovated home in Brewerytown!
This 2 bed 1 bath house is located in the Brewerytown section of Philadelphia (just north of Fairmount/Art Museum area near 29th & Girard). Brewerytown is rich in history, full of character, and quickly developing with cool new restaurants, coffee shops, and convenient shopping. This is a prime location with easy access to highways (76/676/95 and Kelly/Lincoln Drive), public transportation, Center City, the Philadelphia Art Museum, Fairmount Park, and Boathouse Row! Great for runners, bikers, hikers to use the trails along the river.
This gorgeous 2 bedroom 1 bath home is sleek, modern and upscale design throughout. Complete with central air and heat, stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, stove, microwave, and refrigerator. Lovely dark brown hardwood floors throughout, great lighting, granite countertops, good kitchen cabinet space, washer/dryer, and outdoor space!
Overall a must-see unit!

title: Fresh One Bedroom Available Now!
description:
Attracted to uniqueness, sophistication and convenience? You must investigate Pfeiffer House. Built in 1885, Pfeiffer House was constructed for John Pfeiffer and Company, makers of coal transport buckets. The structure captures the decorative ambiance of the loft-warehousing buildings of the district, while boasting an unusually sophisticated Victorian Italiante façade. Come enjoy the perfect marriage of old-world charm and modern day convenience in these wonderful Old City Apartments.

title: This Home is Located on a High Floor and Boasts Gorgeous City Views!
description:
Studio apartment with parquet wood floors throughout at The Philadelphian! This home is located on a high floor and boasts gorgeous city views from a private terrace accessible via the sun-soaked living area. Adjacent, there is an updated, open kitchen showcasing great cabinetry space, a gold light fixture and a breakfast bar. The home also enjoys use of a full hall bathroom with a single vanity and shower/tub, a separate dressing area and excellent storage space throughout. The Philadelphian has often been called a “city within a city” due to its many services and amenities that are offered to residents. From a restaurant to a grocery store, multiple medical offices to a beauty parlor, residents of The Philadelphian will rarely need to travel far to accomplish their daily routine. When the need should arise to leave the premises, the building offers a shuttle bus that runs all day long dropping off and picking up residents throughout Center City. Residents also enjoy a 24 hour doorman, indoor and outdoor pools, and fitness center.
